name: Unknown Item
overview: Bosses have a 0% spawn rate on normal waves and 100% on boss waves. Boss waves are every 10 waves except when a battle condition reduces the waves.

spawn_mechanics.battle_condition_modification: can modify the boss wave frequency
spawn_mechanics.spawn_cap: count toward the 10 boss enemy spawn cap

special_rules.lab_research_bonuses: Module shard and reroll shard drops are increased after researching the appropriate module-based labs

properties.difficulty: High health makes them difficult to defeat quickly
properties.movement: Lower speed means they take longer to reach the tower

rewards.lab_research_bonuses: Additional shards can be earned through lab research

strategic_implications.damage_requirement: Bosses require significant damage output to defeat
strategic_implications.immunity_challenge: Their immunity to many ultimate weapons makes them challenging
strategic_implications.predictability: The 10-wave interval provides predictable boss encounters
strategic_implications.value: High coin value makes them valuable targets despite their difficulty
